text: It is better to be unhappy in love than unhappy in marriage, but some people manage to be both.
author: Guy de Maupassant

text: Marriage, laws, the police, armies and navies are the mark of human incompetence.
author: Dora Russell

text: My first marriage was very traditional, in the church, and then we left the church and went to the reception hall. So this time, I'd like to go fairy tale all the way.
author: NeNe Leakes

text: My parents had a great marriage. Interestingly, it made it harder for me in relationships because I knew what a good relationship looked like.
author: Candace Bushnell

text: I refused David Letterman's proposal of marriage for obvious reasons, but thanks for asking.
author: Teri Garr
